title: Rhestr Tasgau
introduction: Cwblhewch y camau hyn i gael yr hawl gyfreithiol i ddelio ag eiddo rhywun sydd wedi marw.
paragraph1: Gallwch arbed eich cais a dychwelyd ato hwyrach ymlaen.
paragraph2: At the end of each section you will be required to check your answers. If any are incorrect you will have the opportunity to change them before proceeding to the next section. Once you have made your legal declaration, any amendments you want to make to your application after that time will have to be sent in writing to the registry.
deceasedTask: Dywedwch wrthym am yr unigolyn sydd wedi marw
applicantsTask: Rhowch fanylion am y bobl sy’n gwneud cais
reviewAndConfirmTask: Gwiriwch eich atebion a gwnewch eich datganiad cyfreithiol
reviewAndConfirmTaskMultiplesParagraph1: Gallwch barhau â’ch cais pan fydd yr holl ysgutorion wedi gwneud eu datganiad cyfreithiol. Maent wedi cael e-bost sy’n dweud wrthynt beth sydd angen iddynt ei wneud.
reviewAndConfirmTaskMultiplesParagraph2: Os byddwch chi’n newid eich atebion, bydd yr ysgutorion yn gallu gweld y datganiad wedi’i ddiweddaru gan ddefnyddio’r un ddolen a gafodd ei hanfon atynt drwy e-bost.
reviewAndConfirmTaskMultiplesParagraph3H: Ysgutorion sydd angen gwneud datganiad cyfreithiol
reviewAndConfirmTaskMultiplesParagraph3: Rhaid bod pob ysgutor wedi gwneud eu datganiad cyfreithiol cyn y gallwch barhau â’ch cais.
